issues: No type hints provided - function accepts any types that support addition operator
No input validation - could fail with incompatible types (e.g., string + integer)
No documentation or docstring explaining expected behavior
Function name is generic and could conflict with built-in functions in some contexts
verdicts.summary: Function is logically correct for its basic purpose but lacks type safety, input validation, and documentation. Works correctly for compatible types but may raise TypeError for incompatible operands.
Simple arithmetic function with no security vulnerabilities. No input validation needed for basic addition operation, no external dependencies, no dangerous API usage, and no injection risks.
Optimal implementation with O(1) time and space complexity. No performance issues detected.
